body:
Dear All, 


I've followed the guide to use the plugin su2ds for Daysim in Sketchup. I am using Sketchup version 8. I cannot see the su2ds under plugins. 


Has anyone had trouble with this before and know how to solve it? 


Kind regards
Amalie
